Review Text: Basic 'brown caf√©'. Situated in the middle of Amsterdam, which makes the terrace a great addition. I'd recommend this caf√© on sunny days especially. They offer a nice plate of cheese and sausage which goes great with their beers.

Name: Caf√© Zwart
Review Text: Our favorite resting place .... perfect for a great beer and people watching. The place is very small and cozy. Very Amsterdam. They do not serve much food...so if you need to eat, go some place else first... Then come here!

Name: Caf√© Zwart

Name: Caf√© Zwart

Name: Caf√© Zwart
Review Text: AVOID. AVOID. Overpriced at 9 .50 EUROS a pint and 7 euros small. A tourist RIPP OFF and mgr does not like it when you tell him so. Better and reasonable priced bars 5 mins further away.  Disappointing end to a good holiday being EXPLOITED by the owner of the bar who I am told by mgr is called Menno Martens.

Name: Caf√© Zwart
Review Text: I will never return here. The owner is a disgusting person and extremely rude. I heard him curse with diseases to a person who just asked to go to the bathroom. Unbelievable that this place has some good reviews though there are multiple reviews about the owner being rude.

Name: Caf√© Zwart
Review Text: Same experience as all the others, I am Dutch and my international friends were harassed by the owner and staff for simply going to the bathroom while we had a table with drinks. Avoid, go to any of the other 500 bars.

Name: Caf√© Zwart
Review Text: We drank a coffee and sat in the cafe for 30 minutes when the waitress came up and threw us out because we had apparently been there for too long. Very unfriendly, definitely wouldn't recommend!!

Name: Caf√© Zwart
Review Text: Haven't met more rude staff in a long time. Stopped for a drink and pestered us to leave the second it was finished, and harassed one friend who didn't order anything. Overpriced and unpleasant. There are dozens of other places to stop, do yourself a favour and try them
